resources.string: Sorry! Sticky Notes currently requires an Exchange Online mailbox for sync and storage to work. Please contact your IT admin about enabling a mailbox or use the option below to learn more.
We\'re unable to sync Sticky Notes with your account. Please contact Support for help with resolving this issue.
We\'re unable to sync Sticky Notes with your account, but you may be able to try and resolve this issue.
We couldn\'t sync your sticky notes because your Outlook mailbox is full. Try freeing up space in your mailbox by deleting email you no longer need or email with large attachments.
